room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Coven" by HD Escape Rooms Greeley in Fort Collins
room_description: In 1693, Salem, Massachusetts, was consumed by crop failures, plagues, and paranoia. Witchcraft was suspected, and those deemed to be partaking in arcane affairs were persecuted until the land was cleansed. But the Coven did not forget. Three hundred years have passed, and the land is once again plagued by mystical misfortune. The ground spoils, and the town is on the verge of a fourfold cross rip that could sunder reality itself. You and your team of paranormal investigators must now search the town’s graveyard and old Coven church in search of clues from your ancestors to make amends with the past in HD Escape Rooms' “Curse of the Coven” escape game in Greeley.
